Sentencas: Effect of MnO addition on microstructure and ionic transport properties of nanocrystalline cubic(c)-ZrO2 is reported.
Titulo: Effect of Manganese (II) Oxide on microstructure and ionic transport properties of nanostructured cubic zirconia

Sentencas: Monoclinic (m) ZrO2 powders with 10-30 mol% MnO powder are mechanically alloyed in a planetary ball mill at room temperature for 10 h and annealed at 550 degrees C for 6 h. In all compositions m-ZrO2 transforms completely to nanocrystalline c-ZrO2 phase and MnO is fully incorporated into c-ZrO2 lattice.
Titulo: Effect of Manganese (II) Oxide on microstructure and ionic transport properties of nanostructured cubic zirconia

Sentencas: Rietveld's refinement technique is employed for detailed microstructure analysis by analyzing XRD patterns.
Titulo: Effect of Manganese (II) Oxide on microstructure and ionic transport properties of nanostructured cubic zirconia

Sentencas: High resolution transmission electron microscopy (HRTEM) analysis confirms the complete formation of c-ZrO2 phase.
Titulo: Effect of Manganese (II) Oxide on microstructure and ionic transport properties of nanostructured cubic zirconia

Sentencas: Presence of stoichiometric Mn in c-ZrO2 powder is confirmed by Electron Probe Microscopy analysis.
Titulo: Effect of Manganese (II) Oxide on microstructure and ionic transport properties of nanostructured cubic zirconia

Sentencas: XPS analysis reveals that Mn is mostly in Mn2+ oxidation state.
Titulo: Effect of Manganese (II) Oxide on microstructure and ionic transport properties of nanostructured cubic zirconia

Sentencas: A correlation between lattice parameter and oxygen vacancy is established.
Titulo: Effect of Manganese (II) Oxide on microstructure and ionic transport properties of nanostructured cubic zirconia

Sentencas: A detailed ionic conductivity measurement in the 250 degrees-575 degrees C temperature range describes the effect of MnO on conductivity of c-ZrO2.
Titulo: Effect of Manganese (II) Oxide on microstructure and ionic transport properties of nanostructured cubic zirconia

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity (s) of 30 mol% MnO alloyed ZrO2 at 550 degrees C is 0.04 s cm(-1).
Titulo: Effect of Manganese (II) Oxide on microstructure and ionic transport properties of nanostructured cubic zirconia

Sentencas: Electrical relaxation studies are carried out by impedance and modulus spectroscopy.
Titulo: Effect of Manganese (II) Oxide on microstructure and ionic transport properties of nanostructured cubic zirconia

Sentencas: Relaxation frequency is found to increase with temperature and MnO mol fraction.
Titulo: Effect of Manganese (II) Oxide on microstructure and ionic transport properties of nanostructured cubic zirconia

Sentencas: Electrical characterization predicts that these compounds have potentials for use as solid oxide fuel cell electrolyte material.
Titulo: Effect of Manganese (II) Oxide on microstructure and ionic transport properties of nanostructured cubic zirconia
